Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at Woodlawn/93rd
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/41st
ShortDescription: Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, I-55 and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/41st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, I-55 and Cicero, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Cicero/41st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at Main
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Main due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Main due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  •  As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Howard to Linden to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
